comments.body: can we remove usage of the function after https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/87975 merges?
Nope, it's still used by the `kubelet-config` phase of `kubeadm upgrade node` when `--kubelet-version` is set to a version that is different than the current one.

similarly to the change we did in our API imports, we should have a consistent import name e.g. `kubeletconfigv1` that does not change very often.

we can do that after code freeze.
